title: Modern Flat in Prime Location near Wicker Park and Bucktown!
map_address: N Rockwell St near W Evergreen Ave
posting_body: For the health and safety of our current residents, please email us to get more info.
This is a must see home!
Near Division Street, this home is around all the restaurants & shops that Wicker Park & Bucktown have to offer!
Enjoy the open floorplan featuring large windows, high ceilings, & hardwood floors throughout.
You'll love the updated kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a dishwasher, & a large bar/island.
Additional features include in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C & heat, & fantastic natural lighting.
Convenient access to public transportation with the Division, North, California & Western bus lines nearby.
Blue Line at Western is only about a 1 mile walk away, too!
All of the fun of Wicker Park & Bucktown within walking distance!
Earn these rent savings when you host short-term guests, with the help from our team at Loftium!
YOUR SPACE: 2 Beds, 1 Bath + Full Kitchen, Living Room and outdoor patio
GUEST SPACE: 1 Bed, 1 Bath + Separated and comes furnished!
Pet policy: pet rent of $30/month for one pet & $40/month for more than 1 pet
Please email me (Steph) for more information.
